thread.title: Mystery surrounding 'forgotten' EastEnders bus driver is finally explained
thread.title_full: Mystery surrounding 'forgotten' EastEnders bus driver is finally explained

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Mystery surrounding 'forgotten' EastEnders bus driver is finally explained
text:
Mystery surrounding 'forgotten' EastEnders bus driver is finally explained Fans were worried that the residents forgot about him Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Eastenders reveal how bus driver died in shocking crash episode Share this video Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
EastEnders fans had been worried when the poor bus driver was forgotten about in the aftermath of the crash. 
But now, they're upset that is was "just the bus driver" who died. 
After the lives of 11 major characters were put at risk during the epic crash, it seems like bloodthirsty fans of the BBC One soap are unsatisfied with the outcome. 
It turns out that the bus driver suffered a heart attack at the wheel and was later seen being carried off in a body bag. Read More The bus driver suffered a heart attack (Photo: BBC) Fans worried that the residents forgot him (Photo: BBC) 
The driver's fate was explained by Jay, who said: "Heart attack apparently. Poor bloke never stood a chance". 
But fans weren't happy that after all the build up of drama, it was just the poor bus driver who snuffed it. 
When one person tweeted: "i bet none of the major characters die", another fan replied: "wasn't even a minor character it was just the bus driver lmao" The driver was taken away in a body bag (Photo: BBC) 
Another posted: "I feel like there was too much emphasis on that body bag for it to have just been the bus driver..." 
"All that in eastenders and the bus driverthat no one cares about died," said another. 
One fan wrote: "i got so excited over who was dead but i bet it was the bloody bus driver, why does eastenders do this to me" Fans were upset that "just" the driver died (Photo: BBC) 
Another sarcastically commented: "'omg who died omg' the bus driver died you f**kwits". 
On Tuesday night's episode, the fallout from the accident was shown on screen as everyone started to figure out what to do next as they begin to hunt for friends and family, and save them from the rubble. 
However, viewers watching at home were quick to suggest that it seemed the poor bus driver - who appeared to suffer a heart attack at the wheel, leading to the crash - had been forgotten by other characters, although there is still more to come. Was the driver "forgotten" by the residents? (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
